channel.title: Teamwork on FalconBlog

item.title: Day 20
item.description:
ðŸ“… June 20, 2025 â€“ Friday

  • Gazebo & Nav2 Experimentation: Continued working with Gazebo and the Nav2 stack. Ran several tests to improve my understanding of autonomous navigation setups.
  • Weekly Project Meeting: Had our scheduled weekly project meeting. Discussed progress and allocated upcoming tasks.
  • Chess Practice: Played a few more rounds of chess online and pushed my rating slightly higher to 918. Not bad for a weekâ€™s work!

Steady improvements both in robotics and recreational skills. Each step forward builds momentum for the next!

item.title: Day 9
item.description:
ðŸ“… June 9, 2025 â€“ Monday

  • Fun Intro Session with Team: Kicked off the project with a light-hearted and engaging introduction session. Helped everyone get comfortable and energized for the journey ahead.
  • Drafted Project Charter: Took the lead in drafting the official project charter to define scope, goals, and roles. A crucial step to align everyone on the same page.
  • Documented Everything in GitHub: Committed the project charter and related documentation to GitHub for transparency, version control, and team access.
